channel.title: I need help with a .bat yell command
channel.description:
Hey, i was just wondering if i could make it so that on the run.bat, if i type in a word into the run.bat, e.g. "Hey server", it would come up in the chat screen saying: [SERVER] - Hey server
Can someone do that?

item.title: I need help with a .bat yell command
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

Hey, i was just wondering if i could make it so that on the run.bat, if i type in a word into the run.bat, e.g. “Hey server”, it would come up in the chat screen saying:
[SERVER] - Hey server

Can someone do that?

Read full topic
